algorithm_technique: Divide and Conquer with character frequency check
problem_summary_simple: Find the longest substring where every character appears at least k times.
problem_summary_technical: Recursive divide and conquer approach. Splits string at characters with frequency < k, then recursively solves subproblems.
key_insights: Characters with frequency less than k are 'splitters'.
The problem can be broken down recursively based on these splitters.
The base case is when all characters in a substring meet the frequency requirement.
